Package com.xebisco.yield

Interface Behavior

All Superinterfaces:
DefaultAxis, Disposable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRenderable, AnimationPlayer, Application, AudioPlayer, BlankScene, CircleCollider, Collider, ComponentBehavior, EdgeCollider, ExitWithEscapeKey, PhysicsBody, PhysicsJoint, Rectangle, RectangleCollider, Scene, SystemBehavior, Text, TextureRectangle, TextureRectangleLoader, ToggleFullScreenSystem, TriangleCollider
public interface Behavior extends Disposable, DefaultAxis
The Behavior is the main interface of the Yield Game Engine, almost all elements of an application implements this interface.
